name: Mod Translation
description: This mod is used to translate text that other mod added.<LINE><LINE> WARNING: There may be some difference between this mod's translation and official. If you apply this mod, official one will be covered.translate covers:<LINE>mod regions<LINE>mod slugcats<LINE>custom pearls<LINE>custom dialogs<LINE>custom missons<LINE>custom dev comments<LINE><LINE>non-steam version here: https://github.com/InkCloudStarsDream/Rainworld-ModTranslation<LINE><LINE>Currently support Chinese, welcome to help us to translate into other languages.<LINE><LINE>If you want to help us to translate or put up some advice, feel free to DM me on Discord:@MoseYanyun<LINE><LINE>Contributors:<LINE>@MoseYanyun,@Exmeow,@Celen,@W1LD1CECA7,@Echo Wings,@havenoideawhatismyname
